test_cases.name: Negative Scenario - Close the Add/Edit booking screen
test_cases.objective: Verify that closing the Add/Edit booking screen does not create a booking.
preconditions: User is logged in and on the diary screen.
test_cases.steps_summary: Attempt to create a booking but close the Add/Edit booking screen before saving.

test_steps.description: Open Add/Edit booking screen from diary.
Fill in some or all required booking fields (simulate partial and empty input).
Close the Add/Edit booking screen using the close button or 'X' without saving.
Verify that no booking is created in the diary.

test_data_variants.description: Close screen without entering any data.
Close screen after entering only partial required data (e.g., Name only).
Close screen after entering all required data but without saving.

post_conditions: No booking should be present in the diary unless all required fields are filled and booking is saved.
